capsules_submitted.utterance: Ron's belongings are a bit of an oddity, aren't they? I mean, who wouldn't want a gray mouse as a pet? But seriously, it seems like Ron has taken a liking to that little guy.

You know, I've been noticing that Ron's belongings have taken on a rather... somber tone lately. The gray mouse he keeps as a pet seems to be the only thing that brings him some comfort in his life. It's almost as if it's the one thing that can brighten up an otherwise dull atmosphere.
Ron's belongings are a bit of a mess, to be honest. I mean, have you seen the state of his place? It's like he's lost track of everything, including that gray mouse he's always talking about.

Ron's belongings are a bit of a mess, to be honest. I mean, have you seen the state of his place? It's like he just threw everything in a corner and said "oh well". The gray mouse is probably one of the few things that's still somewhat organized, but even that's not exactly tidy.

You know, I've been noticing that Ron's belongings have taken on a rather... somber tone lately. The gray mouse he keeps as a pet seems to be the only thing that brings him some comfort, and even then, it's hard to see it as anything other than a reminder of his current state of mind.
